comments.body: So it's no longer resolves as "accepted" here? `_checkUp` doesn't seem to do that.

There are 2 changes in order to make logic clearer:
First, `_wonArenaForPrimaryPointer` is moved to `_checkUp`.

Now note that
1. `_checkUp` is a no-op when `_wonArenaForPrimaryPointer = false`
2. `_wonArenaForPrimaryPointer` is set to `true` only when when the gesture is accepted.

Therefore, `resolve(GestureDisposition.accepted)` will never be run unless the gesture is already accepted, making it useless.
Got it, makes sense.  Thanks for the explanation.
is there any reason we couldn't do this as part of this PR when it landed?
It was because that this PR was already big and at its 2nd redo, so I didn’t want to introduce unnecessary changes that  affected a lot of files at that time. I’ll fix this.
